81b6(khri brgyad): yongs su dag pa'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor nam mkha' ni skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa'i phyir yongs su dag pa
81b7(khri brgyad): ste/ rab 'byor nam mkha' gos pa med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa yin no/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na nam mkha' gos pa ma mchis pa'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/ bcom
82a1(khri brgyad): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor nam mkha' gzung du med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa yin no/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na nam mkha' gzung du ma mchis pa'i slad du/ shes rab
82a2(khri brgyad): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor nam mkha' smra ba med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa yin no/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na nam mkha' smra ba ma mchis pa'i
82a3(khri brgyad): slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ brag ca gnyis kyi sgra ji lta ba de bzhin du/ rab 'byor nam mkha' smra ba med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa yin
82a4(khri brgyad): no/ /rab 'byor nam mkha' rab tu brjod pa med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa yin no/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na nam mkha' rab tu brjod pa ma mchis pa'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/
82a5(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor nam mkha' la ni rab tu brjod pa gang yang med de/ de ltar na nam mkha' rab tu brjod pa med pa'i/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa yin no/ /rab 'byor nam mkha' dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ shes
82a6(khri brgyad): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa yin no/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na nam mkha' dmigs su ma mchis pa'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor nam mkha'
82a7(khri brgyad): la ni ci yang dmigs su med do/ /rab 'byor de ltar na nam mkha' dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa yin no/ /rab 'byor gzugs shin tu rnam par dag pa dang / dmigs su med pa dang / skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun
82b1(khri brgyad): nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa yin no/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa shin tu rnam par dag pa dang / dmigs su med pa dang / skye ba med pa
82b2(khri brgyad): dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa yin no/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du shin tu rnam par dag pa dang / dmigs su med pa dang / skye
82b3(khri brgyad): ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa yin no/ /rab 'byor chos thams cad shin tu rnam par dag pa dang / gang dmigs su med pa dang / skye ba med pa dang / 'gag
82b4(khri brgyad): pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa yin no/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na chos thams cad shin tu rnam par dag pa dang / dmigs su ma mchis pa dang / skye ba ma
82b5(khri brgyad): mchis pa dang / 'gag pa ma mchis pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa dang / rnam par byang ba ma mchis pa'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor chos thams cad shin tu rnam par dag pa'i
82b6(khri brgyad): phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa yin no/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par bgyid pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la
82b7(khri brgyad): bgyid pa de la ni mig gi nad 'byung bar mi 'gyur lags so/ /rna ba'i nad dang / sna'i nad dang / lce'i nad dang / lus kyi nad 'byung bar mi 'gyur lags so/ /yid kyi nad 'byung bar mi 'gyur lags so/ /yan lag ma tshang bar mi 'gyur lags so/ /lus ngal bar mi 'gyur lags so/ /
83a1(khri brgyad): rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de ni gshis ngan du 'gum par mi 'gyur lags so/ /de'i slad bzhin du chos nyan par 'tshal ba'i lha stong phrag mang po dag kyang 'brang bar 'gyur lags so/ /rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams dang / gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi bar gyi lha rnams
83a2(khri brgyad): kyang slad bzhin du 'brang bar 'gyur lags so/ /gang na dam pa'i chos smra ba'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo dag tshes brgyad dang / bcu bzhi dang / bco lnga dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di smra bar bgyid pa der lha'i tshogs mang po dag kyang 'du bar 'gyur lags so/ rigs kyi bu'am
83a3(khri brgyad): rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di smra bar bgyid pa de ni bsod nams mang du skyed par 'gyur te/ bsod nams dpag tu ma mchis/ grangs ma mchis/ bsam gyis mi khyab/ gzhal du ma mchis pa dag skyed par 'gyur lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor
83a4(khri brgyad): de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang tshes brgyad dang / bcu bzhi dang / bco lnga dag la lha'i 'khor gyi mdun du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa smra bar byed pa de ni bsod nams dpag tu med/ grangs med/ bsam gyis mi khyab/ gzhal du med/ brjod du med pa
83a5(khri brgyad): dag skyed par 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rin po che yin pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor de la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rin po che 'di la brten na sems can dmyal ba las thar bar 'gyur ro/ /dud 'gro'i skye gnas las thar bar 'gyur
83a6(khri brgyad): ro/ /gshin rje'i 'jig rten las thar bar 'gyur ro/ /mi dbul po las thar bar 'gyur ro/ /rgyal rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro/ /bram ze'i rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro/ /khyim bdag gi rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu rnams
83a7(khri brgyad): su skye bar 'gyur ro/ /rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro/ /'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched du nye bar 'gro ba'i bar gyi lha rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu skyed par byed pa yin no/ /lan cig phyir
83b1(khri brgyad): 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub skyed par byed pa yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams rgya cher
83b2(khri brgyad): bstan te/ de la brten nas rgyal rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu rnams yod pa dang / bram ze'i rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu rnams yod pa dang / khyim bdag gi rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu rnams yod pa dang / rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams dang / sum cu rtsa gsum pa dang / 'thab
83b3(khri brgyad): bral dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams yod pa dang / tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don rnams yod pa dang / tshangs ris dang / tshangs pa kun 'khor dang / 'od chung dang / tshad med 'od dang / 'od gsal dang / dge chung dang / tshad med dge dang / dge rgyas
83b4(khri brgyad): dang / 'bras bu che ba dang / 'du shes med pa'i sems can rnams dang / shin tu mthong ba dang / gya nom snang ba dang / mi che ba dang / mi gdung ba dang / 'og min gyi lha rnams dang / nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang / rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang / ci yang med pa'i skye
83b5(khri brgyad): mched dang / 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched du nye bar 'gro ba'i lha rnams yod pa dang / rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub dang / bla na med pa yang dag par
83b6(khri brgyad): rdzogs pa'i byang chub yod pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la bsam gtan bzhi yod pa dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod pa dang / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang /
83b7(khri brgyad): bsam gtan dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod pa dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yod pa dang / yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam rnams yod pa dang / nang stong pa nyid yod pa dang /
84a1(khri brgyad): dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du yod pa dang / stobs bcu yod pa dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yod pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du yod pa'i
84a2(khri brgyad): phyir te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las de dag la sogs pa'i chos rnams rgya cher bstan pas na/ de'i phyir 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rin po che zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ni skye ba'am/ 'gag pa'am/ kun nas
84a3(khri brgyad): nyon mongs pa'am/ rnam par byang ba'am/ yongs su gzung ba'am/ dor ba'i chos gang yang med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar gang dag skye ba'am 'gag pa'am/ kun nas nyon mongs pa'am/ rnam par byang ba'am/ yongs su gzung ba'am 'dor bar bya ba'i chos de dag med pa'i
84a4(khri brgyad): phyir ro/ /rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rin po che 'di la ni dge ba'am/ mi dge ba'am/ zag pa dang bcas pa 'am/ zag pa med pa'am/ kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa'am/ kha na ma tho ba med pa'am/ nyon mongs pa med pa'am/
84a5(khri brgyad): 'jig rten pa'am/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'am/ 'dus byas sam/ 'dus ma byas kyi chos gang yang dmigs su med do/ /rab 'byor rnam grangs des kyang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rin po che yin te/ rab 'byor pha rol tu phyin pa rin po che de ni chos gang gis kyang ma gos pa yin no/ /
84a6(khri brgyad): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar gang gis gos par 'gyur ba'i chos de dmigs su med pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor des na pha rol tu phyin pa rin po che 'di ni gos pa med pa yin no/ /rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa gal te/ de ltar
84a7(khri brgyad): 'du shes par yang mi byed/ de ltar rnam par rtog par yang mi byed/ de ltar spros par yang mi byed na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sgom pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mthong ba yin te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan
84b1(khri brgyad): 'das rnams la bsti stang du bya ba dang / bla mar bya ba dang / ri mor bya ba dang / mchod par bya ba'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro zhing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du song nas kyang / sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed cing / sangs
84b2(khri brgyad): rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed do/ /rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni chos gang yang thob par byed pa ma yin/ ston par byed pa ma yin/ 'dzin par byed pa ma yin/ sbyin par byed pa ma yin/ skyed par byed pa ma yin/ 'gog par byed pa ma yin/ kun nas nyon
84b3(khri brgyad): mongs par byed pa ma yin/ rnam par byang bar byed pa ma yin/ 'grib par byed pa ma yin/ 'phel bar byed pa ma yin/ 'das pa yang ma yin/ ma 'ongs pa yang ma yin/ da ltar byung ba yang ma yin no/ /rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni 'dod pa'i khams
84b4(khri brgyad): las yang dag par 'da' bar byed pa yang ma yin/ gnas par byed pa yang ma yin/ gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs med pa'i khams las yang dag par 'da' bar byed pa yang ma yin/ gnas par byed pa yang ma yin/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa sbyin par byed pa yang ma
84b5(khri brgyad): yin/ 'dor bar byed pa yang ma yin/ tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sbyin par byed pa yang ma yin/ 'dor bar byed pa yang ma yin/ nang stong pa nyid sbyin par byed pa yang ma yin/ 'dor bar byed pa
84b6(khri brgyad): yang ma yin/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du sbyin par byed pa yang ma yin/ 'dor bar byed pa yang ma yin/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams sbyin par byed pa yang ma yin/ 'dor bar byed pa yang ma yin/ de bzhin du yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang
84b7(khri brgyad): pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam rnams sbyin par byed pa yang ma yin/ 'dor bar byed pa yang ma yin/ stobs bcu sbyin par byed pa yang ma yin/ 'dor bar byed pa yang ma yin/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig
85a1(khri brgyad): pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad sbyin par byed pa yang ma yin/ 'dor bar byed pa yang ma yin/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu sbyin par byed pa yang ma yin/ 'dor bar byed pa yang ma yin/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir
85a2(khri brgyad): mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang sangs rgyas nyid dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid sbyin par byed pa yang ma yin/ 'dor bar byed pa yang ma yin no/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams sbyin par byed pa yang ma yin/
85a3(khri brgyad): 'dor bar byed pa yang ma yin/ so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams sbyin par byed pa yang ma yin/ 'dor bar byed pa yang ma yin/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams sbyin par byed pa yang ma yin/ 'dor bar byed pa yang ma yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams sbyin par byed
85a4(khri brgyad): pa yang ma yin/ 'dor bar byed pa yang ma yin no/ /rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni 'dus byas kyi khams 'dor bar byed pa yang ma yin/ 'dus ma byas kyi khams sbyin par byed pa yang ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung /
85a5(khri brgyad): de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ma byung yang rung / chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul 'di ni gnas pa nyid de/ de de bzhin gshegs pas mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas shing mngon par thugs su chud de/ mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas shing / mngon par thugs su chud nas kyang /
85a6(khri brgyad): gsung ba dang / rnam par 'grel ba dang / rnam par 'byed pa dang / ston par mdzad pa'i phyir ro/ /de nas lha'i bu 'bum phrag rab tu mang po dag steng gi bar snang la 'khod nas/ ca co dang / ga zha 'don cing / lha'i me tog ud pa la dang / pad ma dang / ku mu da dang /
85a7(khri brgyad): pad ma dkar po dang / man dar ba dag gis gtor nas/ 'di skad du/ a la la 'dzam bu'i gling du chos kyi 'khor lo lan gnyis bskor ba 'di mthong ngo / /zhes tshig tu yang brjod do/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bstan pa na/ de las lha'i bu stong phrag du ma dag
85b1(khri brgyad): phyir mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rab 'byor dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni chos gang yang 'jug par bya ba'am/
85b2(khri brgyad): ldog par bya ba'i phyir nye bar gnas pa ma yin pas/ rab 'byor 'di ni chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba gnyis pa yang ma yin/ gcig pa yang ma yin no/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gang gi tshe/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni chos gang yang 'jug
85b3(khri brgyad): par bgyi ba 'am/ ldog par bgyi ba'i slad du nye bar gnas pa ma lags pa'i dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas stong ngo / /de bzhin
85b4(khri brgyad): du bsam gtan dang / brtson 'grus dang / bzod pa dang / tshul khrims dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas stong ngo / /nang stong pa nyid ni nang stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo / /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa
85b5(khri brgyad): nyid kyis stong ngo / /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyis stong ngo / /de bzhin du yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam rnams ni lam gyis stong ngo / stobs bcu ni stobs
85b6(khri brgyad): bcus stong ngo / /mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyis stong ngo / rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bus stong ngo / /de bzhin du lan cig
85b7(khri brgyad): phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang sangs rgyas nyid dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis stong ngo / /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ dngos po ma
86a1(khri brgyad): mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni che ba lags te/ chos thams cad kyang chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin gyis stong la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
86a2(khri brgyad): brten nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba yang / chos gang yang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba ma mchis shing / chos kyi 'khor lo yang skor la chos gang yang 'jug par bgyid pa'am/ ldog par bgyid pa yang ma mchis
86a3(khri brgyad): te/ chos gang yang yongs su mthong ba yang ma mchis la/ chos gang yang yongs su ma mthong ba yang ma mchis lags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar gang yang 'jug pa'am/ ldog pa'i chos de dmigs su ma mchis pa'i slad du ste/ 'di ltar chos thams cad gtan mngon
86a4(khri brgyad): par ma grub pa lags pas stong pa nyid ni 'jug par bgyid pa'am/ ldog par bgyid pa ma lags la/ mtshan ma ma mchis pa dang / smon pa ma mchis pa yang 'jug par bgyid pa'am/ ldog par bgyid pa ma lags so/ /de ltar na gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa
86a5(khri brgyad): dang / rab tu bstan pa dang / brjod pa dang / gdags pa dang / 'jug pa dang / rnam par 'grel ba dang / rnam par 'byed pa dang / smos pa dang / gsal bar bgyid pa dang / yang dag par rab tu ston pa 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa yongs su dag pa lags
86a6(khri brgyad): so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa de yang sus kyang ma bstan/ sus kyang ma bzung lags so/ /gang sus kyang ma bstan sus kyang ma bzung ba de ni sus kyang mngon sum du ma bgyid lags so/ /gang sus kyang ma bstan sus kyang ma bzung / sus kyang mngon
86a7(khri brgyad): sum du ma bgyis pa de la ni yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa su yang ma mchis te/ chos bstan pa 'di la su yang sbyin gnas su 'gyur ba yang ma mchis lags so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las gnas med pa'i le'u zhes bya ste sum cu rtsa bdun pa'o// //
86b1(khri brgyad): de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni ma mchis pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor nam mkha' med pa'i phyir ro/ /
86b2(khri brgyad): rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mnyam pa nyid lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor chos thams cad dmigs su med par mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol
86b3(khri brgyad): pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni dben pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes
86b4(khri brgyad): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rdzi ba ma mchis pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha
86b5(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa 'di ni gzhi ma mchis pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ming med pa dang lus med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni nam mkha' lta bu
86b6(khri brgyad): lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni brjod du ma mchis pa lags so/ /
86b7(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rnam par rtog pa dang / rnam par dpyod pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni ming ma mchis pa lags so/ /bcom
87a1(khri brgyad): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i phung po dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin
87a2(khri brgyad): pa 'di ni 'gro ba ma mchis pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad 'gro ba med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mi 'phrogs pa lags so/ /
87a3(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad gzung du med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mi bas pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
87a4(khri brgyad): chos thams cad shin tu byang zhing zad pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni skye ba ma mchis pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad kyi skye ba
87a5(khri brgyad): med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni byed pa po ma mchis pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byed pa po dmigs su med
87a6(khri brgyad): pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni shes pa po ma mchis pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shes pa po dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor
87a7(khri brgyad): gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni 'pho ba ma mchis pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'chi 'pho dang skye ba dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan
87b1(khri brgyad): 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni 'jig pa ma mchis pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis 'jig pa med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/
87b2(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rmi lam lta bu lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rmi lam rmis pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu
87b3(khri brgyad): phyin pa 'di ni brag ca lta bu lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sgra'i brjod pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mig yor lta bu lags so/ /
87b4(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gzugs brnyan dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni smig rgyu lta bu lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
87b5(khri brgyad): chu 'bab pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni sgyu ma lta bu lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mtshan ma dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor
87b6(khri brgyad): gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni gti mug ma mchis pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ma rig pa'i mun pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan
87b7(khri brgyad): 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni kun nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun nas nyon mongs pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das
88a1(khri brgyad): 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rnam par byang ba ma mchis pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun nas nyon mongs pa yod par mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom
88a2(khri brgyad): ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni gnas ma mchis pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes
88a3(khri brgyad): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni dmigs su ma mchis pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gnas dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu
88a4(khri brgyad): phyin pa 'di ni spros pa ma mchis pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ spros pa thams cad yang dag par bcom pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rlom
88a5(khri brgyad): sems ma mchis pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rlom sems thams cad yang dag par bcom pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni g.yo ba ma mchis pa
88a6(khri brgyad): lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos kyi dbyings gnas pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni 'dod chags dang bral ba lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das
88a7(khri brgyad): kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad ma nor ba de bzhin nyid du mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par byed pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni kun nas ldang ba ma mchis pa lags so/ /
88b1(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad rnam par rtog pa med pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni zhi ba lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
88b2(khri brgyad): chos thams cad mtshan ma med cing dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni 'dod chags ma mchis pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'dod
88b3(khri brgyad): chags kyi mtshan ma dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni zhe sdang ma mchis pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ zhe sdang yod pa ma yin pa'i
88b4(khri brgyad): phyir ro/ / //shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa/ bam po sum cu pa/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni gti mug ma mchis pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das
88b5(khri brgyad): kyis bka' stsal pa/ gti mug gi mun pa rnam par sel ba nyid kyi phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
88b6(khri brgyad): pa/ yongs su rtog pa med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni sems can ma mchis pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sems can dmigs su
88b7(khri brgyad): med pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni tshad ma mchis pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad kun nas ldang ba med pa'i phyir ro/ /
89a1(khri brgyad): rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mtha' gnyis su ma mchis pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mtha' dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /
89a2(khri brgyad): rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni ma 'dres pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad 'dres pa med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan
89a3(khri brgyad): 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni nag nog ma mchis pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las yang dag par 'das pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das
89a4(khri brgyad): 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rnam par mi rtog pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rnam par rtog pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha
89a5(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni tshad ma mchis pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad kyi tshad dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di
89a6(khri brgyad): ni nam mkha' lta bu lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad nam mkha' ltar chags pa med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mi rtag pa lags
89a7(khri brgyad): so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad 'jig pa med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni sdug bsngal ba lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
89b1(khri brgyad): pa/ chos thams cad lhag par chags par bya ba'i 'os ma yin pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni bdag ma mchis pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
89b2(khri brgyad): chos thams cad mngon par zhen pa med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni stong pa nyid lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin dmigs
89b3(khri brgyad): su med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mtshan nyid ma mchis pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad mtshan ma med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor
89b4(khri brgyad): gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni nang stong pa nyid lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nang gi chos rnams dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan
89b5(khri brgyad): 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni phyi stong pa nyid lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ phyi'i chos rnams dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha
89b6(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni phyi nang stong pa nyid lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ phyi dang nang gi chos rnams dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa
89b7(khri brgyad): 'di ni stong pa nyid stong pa nyid lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni chen po stong pa nyid
90a1(khri brgyad): lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chen po stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni don dam pa stong pa nyid lags so/ /bcom
90a2(khri brgyad): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ don dam pa stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni 'dus byas stong pa nyid lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
90a3(khri brgyad): stsal pa/ 'du byas stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'dus
90a4(khri brgyad): ma byas stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mtha' las 'das pa
90a5(khri brgyad): stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ thog ma dang tha ma med
90a6(khri brgyad): pa stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni dor ba med pa stong pa nyid lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dmigs
90a7(khri brgyad): su med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rang bzhin stong pa nyid lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas kyi chos dmigs su
90b1(khri brgyad): med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni chos thams cad stong pa nyid lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir
90b2(khri brgyad): ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab
90b3(khri brgyad): 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis
90b4(khri brgyad): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni dngos po med pa stong pa nyid lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/
90b5(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/
90b6(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di
90b7(khri brgyad): lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lus dang / tshor ba dang / sems dang / chos dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di
91a1(khri brgyad): lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni yang dag pa'i spong ba lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge ba dang / mi dge ba'i chos rnams dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom
91a2(khri brgyad): ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di
91a3(khri brgyad): lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni dbang po lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dbang po lnga dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol
91a4(khri brgyad): tu phyin pa 'di ni stobs lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ stobs lnga dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni byang chub kyi yan lag lags so/ /
91a5(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni lam lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
91a6(khri brgyad): stsal pa/ lam yan lag brgyad pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni stong pa nyid lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lta bar gyur pa
91a7(khri brgyad): dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mtshan ma ma mchis pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rnam par rtog pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir
91b1(khri brgyad): ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni smon pa ma mchis pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ smon lam dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/
91b2(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rnam par thar pa brgyad dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di
91b3(khri brgyad): lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni snyoms par 'jug pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das
91b4(khri brgyad): 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni 'phags pa'i bden pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sdug bsngal ba dang / kun 'byung ba dang / 'gog pa dang / lam dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/
91b5(khri brgyad): bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni sbyin pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ser sna dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha
91b6(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni tshul khrims lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'chal pa'i tshul khrims dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu
91b7(khri brgyad): phyin pa 'di ni bzod pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gnod sems dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni brtson 'grus lags
92a1(khri brgyad): so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ le lo dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni bsam gtan lags so/ /bcom ldan
92a2(khri brgyad): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ g.yeng ba dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni shes rab lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'chal
92a3(khri brgyad): pa'i shes rab dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni stobs bcu lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad dmigs su med
92a4(khri brgyad): pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mi 'jigs pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor
92a5(khri brgyad): gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni so so yang dag par rig pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ thams cad du ye shes chags pa med cing thogs pa med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis
92a6(khri brgyad): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni snying rje chen po lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sems can thams cad yongs su mi gtong ba'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom
92a7(khri brgyad): ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa'i phyir ro/ /rab
92b1(khri brgyad): 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni de bzhin nyid lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ brjod pa thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid yin pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol
92b2(khri brgyad): pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rang byung lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad la dbang sgyur ba'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/
92b3(khri brgyad): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni sangs rgyas lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad rnam pa thams cad du mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'i phyir ro/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las/
92b4(khri brgyad): dmigs su med pa'i le'u zhes bya ste sum cu rtsa brgyad pa'o// //de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin 'di snyam du sems te/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang dag gi rna lam du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di grag pa de dag kyang sngon gyi rgyal ba la lhag par bya
92b5(khri brgyad): ba byas pa yin la/ gang dag gi rna lam du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di grag par 'gyur ba de dag kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa las dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams bskyed cing / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa yin no/ /gang dag 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba
92b6(khri brgyad): dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / bzung zhing bcangs la blags shing kun chub par byas nas kyang / de bzhin nyid du sgrub par byed pa dag lta smos kyang ci dgos/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa
92b7(khri brgyad): dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / bzung zhing bcangs la blags shing kun chub par byas nas kyang / de bzhin nyid du sgrub par byed pa de dag gis ni sangs rgyas mang po dag la bsnyen bkur byas pa yin no/ /rigs kyi bu'am rigs
93a1(khri brgyad): kyi bu mo gang dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos nas kyang mi skrag mi dngang zhing / dngang bar mi 'gyur ba de dag gis ni sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la yang yongs su zhu ba
93a2(khri brgyad): byas pa yin no/ /gang dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos nas kyang mi skrag mi dngang zhing dngang bar mi 'gyur ba de dag gis ni bskal pa bye ba phrag mang po dag nas/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad cing / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang /
93a3(khri brgyad): brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad pa yin no snyam mo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol
93a4(khri brgyad): tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos nas mi skrag mi dngang zhing / dngang bar mi 'gyur la/ 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par bgyid pa dang / tshul bzhin du yang brtson par bgyid pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems
93a5(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ji lta ba de ltar gzung bar bgyid lags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni zab lags te/ sngon pha rol tu phyin pa drug po dag la ma spyad pa dag gis ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
93a6(khri brgyad): phyin pa zab mo 'di la mos par rngo mi thogs pa'i slad du'o/ /bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di spong bar sems pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis ni/ sngon gyi mthar yang shes rab kyi pha
93a7(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di spangs pa lags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la dad pa ma mchis pa dang / dga' ba ma mchis pa dang / dad pa ma mchis pas
93b1(khri brgyad): rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis sangs rgyas rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi nyan thos rnams la 'di skad du/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la ni ji ltar spyad par bgyi/ tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab
93b2(khri brgyad): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ni ji ltar spyad par bgyi/ nang stong pa nyid la ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi/ phyi stong pa nyid la ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi/ phyi nang stong pa nyid la ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la ni ji ltar bsgom par
93b3(khri brgyad): bgyi/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi/ yang dag pa'i spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam rnams la ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i
93b4(khri brgyad): stobs bcu la ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi/ mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi/ zhes yongs su zhu ba ma bgyis pa'i slad du'o/ /de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin
93b5(khri brgyad): gyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so/ /btsun pa shA ri'i bu de ltar ngo mtshar yang ci che ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni shin tu zab pas na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang sngon gyi mthar yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab
93b6(khri brgyad): mo 'di la mos par ma gyur pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mos par ma gyur pa dang / nang stong pa nyid la mos par ma gyur pa dang / dngos
93b7(khri brgyad): po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la mos par ma gyur pa dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun la mos par ma gyur pa dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / sangs
94a1(khri brgyad): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la mos par ma gyur pa dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di spong bar byed pa ni ngo mtshar mi che'o/ /btsun pa shA ri'i bu gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la phyag 'tshal ba de ni/ rnam pa thams cad
94a2(khri brgyad): mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes la phyag 'tshal ba yin pas na/ bcom ldan 'das ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bdag phyag 'tshal lo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /kau shi ka de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/
94a3(khri brgyad): gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la phyag 'tshal ba de ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes la phyag 'tshal ba yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka 'di ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol
94a4(khri brgyad): tu phyin pa 'di las nges par byung la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes kyis rab tu bskyed pa yin pa'i phyir te/ kau shi ka rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gnas par 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mos shes
94a5(khri brgyad): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas par bya'o/ /de bzhin du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes skyed par 'dod pa dang / bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba dang / nyon mongs pa thams cad yang dag par 'joms par 'dod pa dang / bla na med pa yang dag par
94a6(khri brgyad): rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pa dang / chos kyi 'khor lo skor bar 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mos kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas par bya'o/ /de bzhin du sems can rnams rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la
94a7(khri brgyad): dgod par 'dod pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid la dgod par 'dod pa dang / rang byang chub la dgod par 'dod pa dang / sems can rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
94b1(khri brgyad): chub la dgod par 'dod pa dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun yongs su bsdu bar 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnal 'byor du bya'o/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la lha'i dbang po brgya
94b2(khri brgyad): byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa lags/ ji ltar na rnal 'byor du bgyid pa lags/ ji ltar na bsam gtan dang / brtson 'grus dang / bzod pa
94b3(khri brgyad): dang / tshul khrims dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa lags/ ji ltar na rnal 'byor du bgyid pa lags/ ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad na/ nang stong pa nyid la rnal 'byor du bgyid pa lags/ ji ltar na dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid
94b4(khri brgyad): stong pa nyid kyi bar la rnal 'byor du bgyid pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad na/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun la rnal 'byor du bgyid pa lags/ de bzhin du byang
94b5(khri brgyad): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco
94b6(khri brgyad): brgyad la rnal 'byor du bgyid pa lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /kau shi ka gang khyod de bzhin gshegs pa la don de yongs su zhu bar sems pa ni legs so legs so/ /kau shi ka khyod
94b7(khri brgyad): kyi spobs pa skyes pa de yang sangs rgyas kyi mthu yin te/ kau shi ka de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang / ngas khyod la bshad par bya'o/ /kau shi ka 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa gzugs la mi
95a1(khri brgyad): gnas te/ gang gi tshe gzugs la mi gnas pa de'i tshe gzugs la rnal 'byor du byed pa yin no/ /de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la mi gnas te/ gang gi tshe rnam par shes pa la mi gnas
95a2(khri brgyad): pa de'i tshe/ rnam par shes pa la rnal 'byor du byed pa yin no/ /de bzhin du mig la mi gnas/ rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid la mi gnas te/ de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnal 'byor du byed do/ /de bzhin du gzugs la mi gnas/
95a3(khri brgyad): sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya dang / chos rnams la mi gnas te/ de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnal 'byor du byed do/ /de bzhin du sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la mi gnas par shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnal 'byor du byed do/ /de bzhin du tshul khrims
95a4(khri brgyad): dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi gnas par shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnal 'byor du byed do/ /nang stong pa nyid la mi gnas par shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnal 'byor du byed do/ /dngos po med
95a5(khri brgyad): pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la mi gnas par shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnal 'byor du byed do/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la mi gnas par shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnal 'byor du byed do/ /de bzhin du yang dag pa'i spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi
95a6(khri brgyad): rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / lam la mi gnas par shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnal 'byor du byed do/ /tshad med pa bzhi la mi gnas par shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnal 'byor du byed
95a7(khri brgyad): do/ /bsam gtan bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga la mi gnas/ stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la mi gnas
95b1(khri brgyad): par shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnal 'byor du byed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar gang la gnas pa dang gang la rnal 'byor du byed pa'i gzugs de dmigs su med pa dang / de bzhin du gang la gnas pa dang / gang la rnal 'byor du byed pa'i tshor ba dang / 'du shes
95b2(khri brgyad): dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dang / de bzhin du khams rnams dang / skye mched rnams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / stobs
95b3(khri brgyad): bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /kau shi ka gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzugs la sbyor bar mi byed de/ gang gi phyir
95b4(khri brgyad): gzugs la sbyor bar mi byed pa de ltar gzugs la rnal 'byor du byed do/ /de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la sbyor bar mi byed de/ gang gi phyir rnam par shes pa la sbyor bar mi byed pa de ltar rnam par shes pa la rnal
95b5(khri brgyad): 'byor du byed do/ /de bzhin du khams rnams dang / skye mched rnams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang /
95b6(khri brgyad): so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la sbyor bar mi byed de/ gang gi phyir sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la sbyor bar mi byed pa de ltar/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la rnal 'byor du byed do/ /de ci'i
95b7(khri brgyad): phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des gzugs sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs/ gzugs phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs/ gzugs da ltar byung bar mi dmigs shing de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes
96a1(khri brgyad): pa sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs/ rnam par shes pa phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs/ rnam par shes pa da ltar byung bar mi dmigs la de bzhin du khams rnams dang / skye mched rnams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang /
96a2(khri brgyad): byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs/
96a3(khri brgyad): da ltar byung bar mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni zab pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid
96a4(khri brgyad): zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab pa yin no/ /shA ri'i bu de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab pa yin no/ /shA ri'i bu de bzhin du khams rnams
96a5(khri brgyad): dang / skye mched rnams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos
96a6(khri brgyad): ma 'dres pa'i de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab pa yin no/ shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gting dpag dka' ba lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu gzugs gting dpag
96a7(khri brgyad): dka' ba'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gting dpag dka' ba yin no/ /shA ri'i bu de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gting dpag dka' ba yin no/ /shA ri'i
96b1(khri brgyad): bu de bzhin du khams rnams dang / skye mched rnams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams
96b2(khri brgyad): dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gting dpag dka' ba yin no/ /shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni tshad ma mchis pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das
96b3(khri brgyad): kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu gzugs tshad med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad med pa yin no/ /shA ri'i bu tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa tshad med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad med pa yin no/ /
96b4(khri brgyad): shA ri'i bu de bzhin du khams rnams dang / skye mched rnams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag
96b5(khri brgyad): par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams tshad med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad med pa yin no/ /shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
96b6(khri brgyad): spyod pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gal te/ gzugs zab ces bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no/ /de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams
96b7(khri brgyad): dang / rnam par shes pa zab ces bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no/ /de bzhin du khams rnams dang / skye mched rnams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs
97a1(khri brgyad): kyi chos rnams dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams zab ces bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ri'i
97a2(khri brgyad): bu 'di ltar gzugs kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni gzugs ma yin la/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni rnam par shes pa ma yin zhing / de bzhin du khams rnams dang / skye mched rnams dang / rten cing 'brel par
97a3(khri brgyad): 'byung ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni
97a4(khri brgyad): sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ma yin no/ /zhes bya ba de ltar yang mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin pa'i phyir ro/ /shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni gal te gzugs gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar mi
97a5(khri brgyad): spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no/ /gal te tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no/ /de bzhin du khams rnams dang / skye mched
97a6(khri brgyad): rnams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres
97a7(khri brgyad): pa rnams gting dpag dka' zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ri'i bu 'di ltar gzugs kyi gting dpag dka' ba nyid gang yin pa de ni gzugs ma yin la/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams
97b1(khri brgyad): dang / rnam par shes pa'i gting dpag dka' ba nyid gang yin pa de ni rnam par shes pa ma yin zhing / de bzhin du khams rnams dang / skye mched rnams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi
97b2(khri brgyad): phyogs kyi chos rnams dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi gting dpag dka' ba nyid gang yin pa de ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ma yin no zhes bya bar yang mi spyod na/ shes
97b3(khri brgyad): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin pa'i phyir ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi gting dpag dka' ba nyid gang yin pa de ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ma yin pa'i phyir ro/ /shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab
97b4(khri brgyad): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa gal te/ gzugs tshad med do zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no/ /de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa tshad med do zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha
97b5(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ri'i bu 'di ltar gzugs kyi tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni gzugs ma yin la/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa tshad med pa nyid gang yin pa de ni rnam par shes pa ma yin zhing de
97b6(khri brgyad): bzhin du khams rnams dang / skye mched rnams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig
97b7(khri brgyad): pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi tshad med pa nyid gang yin pa de ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin pa'i phyir ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ri'i bu 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi
98a1(khri brgyad): chos rnams kyi tshad med pa nyid gang yin pa de ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ma yin pa'i phyir ro/ /shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni de tsam du zab pa dang / de tsam du gting dpag dka' ba dang / de tsam du rtogs
98a2(khri brgyad): par dka' ba dang / de tsam du tshad ma mchis pa lags te/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mdun du bshad par mi bgyi ste/ de dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di
98a3(khri brgyad): thos na skrag cing dngang la dngang bar 'gyur lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di ni phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mdun du bshad par bgyi ste/ des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos na mi skrag mi dngang la dngang bar mi 'gyur zhing / nem
98a4(khri brgyad): nur bgyid par mi 'gyur/ the tshom 'tshal bar mi 'gyur ba'i steng du thos nas kyang mos par 'gyur lags so/ /de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so/ /btsun pa shA ri'i bu theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
98a5(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po'i mdun du gal te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bshad na/ nyes pa cir 'gyur/ shA ri'i bus smras pa/ kau shi ka theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mdun du gal te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
98a6(khri brgyad): phyin pa zab mo 'di bshad par gyur na/ skrag cing dngang la/ dngang bar 'gyur zhing / phyir spong bar 'gyur te/ mos par mi 'gyur la/ kau shi ka gang gi phyir theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di
98a7(khri brgyad): thos na phyir spong zhing / log par ltung bar 'gro ba lags par 'gyur te/ yun ring pos kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar dka' ba'i gnas de yod do/ /brgya byin gyis smras pa/ btsun pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa'
98b1(khri brgyad): sems dpa' chen po lung ma bstan pa gang dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos na/ mi skrag mi dngang zhing / dngang bar mi 'gyur ba lta yod dam/ shA ri'i bus smras pa/ kau shi ka byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag gis shes rab kyi pha
98b2(khri brgyad): rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos na/ mi skrag mi dngang zhing / dngang bar mi 'gyur ba de dag ni ring po mi thogs par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa 'thob par 'gyur te/ de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa gcig gam/ gnyis las mi 'da' ba'i bar
98b3(khri brgyad): gyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa 'thob par 'gyur ba yin no/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
98b4(khri brgyad): gang dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos na/ mi skrag mi dngang zhing / dngang bar mi 'gyur ba'i steng du thos nas kyang 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed cing ji skad bstan pa bzhin du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
98b5(khri brgyad): gnas par 'gyur ba de dag ni/ yun ring po nas theg pa la yang dag par zhugs shing / pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod spyod pa dang / sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur byed byed pa yin no/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol
98b6(khri brgyad): to/ /bcom ldan 'das dper brjod par bdag shin tu spobs lags so/ /bde bar gshegs pa bdag spobs lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu khyod spobs par gyis shig /shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta
98b7(khri brgyad): ste dper bgyi na/ theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo zhig gi g.yar lam du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sgom pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol
99a1(khri brgyad): tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sgom pa dang / byang chub kyi snying po la mchis pa'i bar dag rmis par gyur na/ bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
99a2(khri brgyad): pa'i byang chub dang nye bar gyur pa lags par rigs par bgyi na/ bcom ldan 'das gang dag sad pa na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sgom pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
99a3(khri brgyad): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sgom pa dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas shing / mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas kyang / byang chub kyi snying po la mchis shing / chos
99a4(khri brgyad): kyi 'khor lo bskor bar sems pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dang nye bar 'gyur ba lta smos kyang ci 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab
99a5(khri brgyad): mo 'di mnyan pa'i slad du rnyed cing thos nas kyang / de bzhin nyid du sgrub par bgyid pa de dag ni dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su smin pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos nas/ 'dzin pa dang / 'chang
99a6(khri brgyad): ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par bgyid pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa de dag ni yun ring po nas theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun pa dang / sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur bgyis pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs
99a7(khri brgyad): su zin pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rnyed par 'gyur zhing / rnyed par gyur nas kyang 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par bgyid
99b1(khri brgyad): pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan du nye ba'am/ lung bstan par 'gyur ba'am/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur lags
99b2(khri brgyad): so/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper bgyi na/ mi zhig 'brog dgon pa dpag tshad brgya pa zhig nas byung bar gyur tam/ 'brog dgon pa dpag tshad nyis brgya pa zhig nas sam/ dpag tshad sum brgya pa zhig nas sam/ dpag tshad bzhi brgya pa zhig nas sam/ dpag
99b3(khri brgyad): tshad lnga brgya pa zhig nas byung bar gyur nas/ de byung ba'i tshe grong khyer gyi snga ltas ba lang rdzi dag gam/ phyugs rdzi dag gam sa mtshams sam/ kun dga' ra ba'am tshal dag gam/ skyed mos tshal dag mthong bar gyur tam/ grong khyer gyi snga ltas grong dag gam/ grong
99b4(khri brgyad): rdal dag gam ljongs dag gam/ yul 'khor dag gam mtshan ma gzhan gang yang rung ba dag mthong bar gyur na/ de 'di snyam du snga ltas 'di lta bu 'di dag gda' ba las na/ 'di nas grong dang / grong rdal dang / grong khyer dang / yul 'khor dang / rgyal po'i pho brang dang
99b5(khri brgyad): nye bar 'gyur ro snyam nas/ dbugs phyin par 'gyur zhing / de la slan chad chom rkun gyis 'jigs pa 'am/ gdug pas 'jigs pa 'am/ gdol pas 'jigs pa'am/ gcan gzan khro bos 'jigs pa'am/ bkres pa dang skom pas 'jigs pa dag 'byung bar mi
99b6(khri brgyad): 'gyur lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di rnyed par 'gyur zhing rnyed par gyur nas kyang 'dzin par bgyid/ 'chang bar bgyid/ klog par bgyid/ kun chub par bgyid/ tshul
99b7(khri brgyad): bzhin du yid la bgyid na/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni lung bstan du nye ba dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang ring po mi thogs par mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur bar rig par bgyi ste/ byang chub
100a1(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sas 'jigs par mi bgyid lags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la
100a2(khri brgyad): blta ba dang phyag bgyi ba dang bsnyen bkur bgyi ba rnyed cing mnyan du rnyed de/ snga ltas de dag mchis pa'i slad du'o/ /de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /shA ri'i bu de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ shA ri'i
100a3(khri brgyad): bu sangs rgyas kyi mthus khyod shin tu spobs par gyis shig / shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper bgyi na mi zhig rgya mtsho chen po lta 'tshal bar gyur nas de rgya mtsho chen po blta ba'i slad du mchis na ji lta ji ltar rgya mtsho chen po blta ba'i slad du mchis pa/ de lta de ltar
100a4(khri brgyad): des yal ga gel ba'am/ yal ga gel ba'i mtshan ma'am/ ri'am ri'i mtshan ma dag mthong bar gyur na des 'di ltar rgya mtsho chen po ni 'di nas thag ring ste rgya mtsho chen po ni 'di nas thag nye ba ma lags so snyam du rig par bgyi'o/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ rgya mtsho chen po dang nye ba
100a5(khri brgyad): na yal ga gel ba'am/ yal ga gel ba'i mtshan ma'am/ ri'am ri'i mtshan ma dag ma mchis pa'i slad du'o/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper bgyi na/ mi zhig rgya mtsho chen po lta 'tshal bar gyur nas/ ji lta ji ltar mchis pa de lta de ltar des yal ga gel ba'am/ yal
100a6(khri brgyad): ga gel ba'i mtshan ma'am/ ri'am ri'i mtshan ma dag ma mthong bar gyur na/ de 'di snyam du rgya mtsho chen po ni 'di nas thag mi ring ngo snyam du sems par 'gyur lags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ rgya mtsho chen po dang nye ba na yal ga gel ba'am/ yal ga gel ba'i mtshan
100a7(khri brgyad): ma'am/ ri'am ri'i mtshan ma dag mi gda' ba'i slad du'o/ /mi de'i mig gis rgya mtsho chen po ma mthong du lags kyang / des bdag ni rgya mtsho chen po dang nye bar gyur te/ rgya mtsho chen po ni 'di nas thag nye'o/ /rgya mtsho chen po ni 'di nas thag mi ring ngo zhes bgyi bar nges
100b1(khri brgyad): par rtogs lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyan pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par bgyid pa des kyang 'di ltar rig par bgyi zhing / 'di ltar
100b2(khri brgyad): bsam par bgyi ste/ bdag de bzhin gshegs pas bskal pa 'di snyed cig gam/ bskal pa brgya phrag 'di snyed cig gam/ bskal pa stong phrag 'di snyed cig gam/ bskal pa 'bum phrag 'di snyed cig gam/ bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum phrag 'di snyed
100b3(khri brgyad): cig na/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ /zhes mngon sum du lung ma bstan kyang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan du nye ba
100b4(khri brgyad): lags so snyam du rig par bgyi'o/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar bdag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di blta zhing mnyan du rnyed la thos nas kyang gzung ba dang / bcang ba dang / klag pa dang / kun chub par bgyid pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyir
100b5(khri brgyad): mchis so snyam du sems pa'i slad du'o/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ dper bgyi na/ dpyid byung ste/ yal ga 'gel ba rnams kyi lo ma dang / 'dab ma lhags par gyur pa na/ 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi rnams kyis 'di ltar da ni ring po mi thogs par lo ma dang / me tog dang /
100b6(khri brgyad): 'bras bu dag 'byung bar 'gyur ro snyam du rig par bgyi lags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar yal ga 'gel ba rnams la snga ltas de dag gda' ba'i slad du ste/ 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi rnams kyis yal ga 'gel ba rnams la snga ltas de dag mthong nas/ 'di snyam du de
100b7(khri brgyad): ni ring po mi thogs par lo ma dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu dag 'byung bar 'gyur ro snyam nas/ yid dga' bar 'gyur lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du gang gi tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di blta ba
101a1(khri brgyad): dang / mnyan pa'i slad du rnyed cing thos nas kyang 'dzin par bgyid/ 'chang bar bgyid/ klog par bgyid/ kun chub par bgyid/ tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid na/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni dge
101a2(khri brgyad): ba'i rtsa ba yongs su smin pa lags par rig par bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de ni/ sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur bgyid bgyid pa lags par rig par bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
101a3(khri brgyad): chen po de dag gis kyang 'di snyam du/ gang gi slad du bdag cag gi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di rnyed cing bltar mchis pa dang / mnyan du mchis pa dang / phyag bgyir mchis pa dang / ji skad bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgrub tu mchis
101a4(khri brgyad): pa las na/ bdag cag ni sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba dag gis/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la bsnyen pa lags so snyam du rig par bgyi lags so/ /de na gang dag sngon sangs rgyas mthong bar gyur pa'i lha'i bu dag 'di snyam du/ sngon gyi byang chub
101a5(khri brgyad): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la yang lung bstan par 'gyur ba'i snga ltas 'di lta bu de dag byung bar gyur pas na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di dag kyang / ring po mi thogs par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan par
101a6(khri brgyad): 'gyur ro snyam nas yi rangs shing rab tu dga' ste/ dga' ba dang yid bde ba skye lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper bgyi na/ bud med sbrum pa ni ji lta ji ltar bu btsa' bar nye ba de lta de ltar de'i lus 'gyur te/ lus ngal ba'i tshor ba chen po skye ba
101a7(khri brgyad): dang / 'chag par mi bgyid pa dang / dran pa chung ba dang / g.yar zas kyi dad chung ba dang / rmugs pa dang / gnyid chung ba dang / tshor ba de lta bu dag byung bas smra ba nyung ba dang / des sngon tshul bzhin ma lags pa yid la bgyis shing bsten pa dang / lan mang du
101b1(khri brgyad): bgyis shing kun du bsten pas 'di lta bu'i tshor ba 'di dag nyams su myong ngo snyam du rtogs nas/ mi sten pa'i ngang tshul can du 'gyur zhing / bud med gzhan dag gis kyang / bud med de'i mtshan ma gang lags pa de dag mthong nas/ 'di snyam du bud med 'di ni ring po mi
101b2(khri brgyad): thogs par bu btsa' bar 'gyur ro zhes rtogs par 'gyur lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun pa/ sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur bgyis pa spyod pa legs par spyad pa/ dge ba'i
101b3(khri brgyad): bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su smin pa dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di rnyed cing rnyed nas kyang / 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par bgyid pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa'i byang chub sems
101b4(khri brgyad): dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kyang ring po mi thogs par/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan par 'gyur bar rig par bgyi lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu khyod spobs pa skyes pa 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi mthu
101b5(khri brgyad): yin te/ shA ri'i bu legs so legs so// //'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa/ bam po sum cu rtsa gcig pa/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar
101b6(khri brgyad): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la sman btags pa ni ngo mtshar lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems
101b7(khri brgyad): dpa' chen po rnams ni skye bo mang po la phan pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / 'jig rten la snying brtse ba dang / lha dang mi rnams kyi skye bo phal po che'i don dang / phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu zhugs pa yin te/ byang
102a1(khri brgyad): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag spyad pa spyod pa na/ bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi po sbyin pa dang / snyan par smra ba dang / don 'thun pa dang / don spyad pa dag gis byang chub sems dpa' stong phrag mang po dag la phan 'dogs shing / sems
